mario in lylat system

2022-10-21: running two n64 instances (super mario 64 and lylat wars), both receiving input, and blending in TouchDesigner. also tried blending via checkerboard matte. also tried blending using a third n64 instance running killer instinct as the matte. 2022-10-28: we also tried making the matte be a smaller portion of the screen, or a single color, black, resulting in a scenario where you could play starfox inside a chain chomp. by using black as a matte we also got the death bowser sweep animation from mario 64 to become a plundered transition between games.




inspiration

  • david kanaga

techniques

  • blending
  • transitions

tools

  • BizHawk
  • TouchDesigner

devlogs

  • 2022-10-21
  • 2022-10-28
